name: Stranger Things
description: A group of kids in the 1980s uncover a government secret and battle supernatural forces from the Upside Down.

name: Money Heist
description: A criminal mastermind known as 'The Professor' plans a heist on the Royal Mint of Spain, recruiting eight skilled robbers.

name: Squid Game
description: Hundreds of cash-strapped contestants accept an invitation to compete in deadly children's games for a huge prize.

name: The Witcher
description: Geralt of Rivia, a monster hunter, struggles to find his place in a world where people are often more wicked than beasts.

name: Dark
description: A sci-fi thriller where the disappearance of a child leads to uncovering a mystery spanning multiple generations and timelines.

name: Narcos
description: A dramatized look at the rise and fall of notorious drug cartels in Colombia, featuring Pablo Escobar.

name: Wednesday
description: A supernatural mystery series following Wednesday Addams as she uncovers secrets at Nevermore Academy.

name: Bridgerton
description: A period drama following the romantic lives of the wealthy Bridgerton family in Regency-era England.

name: The Crown
description: A historical drama series chronicling the reign of Queen Elizabeth II from the 1940s to modern times.

name: Black Mirror
description: An anthology series exploring the dark side of technology and how it impacts human life.

name: You
description: A psychological thriller following a charming but dangerously obsessive bookstore manager.

name: Lucifer
description: The Devil abandons Hell and settles in Los Angeles, helping the LAPD solve crimes while exploring his own redemption.

name: Peaky Blinders
description: A historical crime drama following the rise of the Peaky Blinders gang in post-WWI Birmingham, England.

name: All of Us Are Dead
description: A group of high school students must survive a zombie outbreak that starts in their school.

name: The Sandman
description: A fantasy drama following Morpheus, the King of Dreams, as he restores balance to his realm after years of captivity.
